description:
Yoshino, the granddaughter of the local yakuza boss in Osaka, is shocked when she learns that to establish peace between their gangs, she is supposed to become engaged to the grandson of a boss from Tokyo.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Ain`t No Place for Losers Here
Makeinu ni Deru Maku wa Nai
負け犬に出る幕はない
